short_description: schrack technik - bosna i hercegovina is an electronics store based in local community centar ii, bosnia and herzegovina.
long_description:
schrack technik je jedna od vodećih tvrtki za distribuciju inovativnih proizvoda iz oblasti elektrotehnike. dr. eduard schrack je davne 1920. godine osnovao tvrtku schrack ag iz koje je nastala danas postojeća grupacija schrack technik gmb
h. schrack technik neprestano proširuje svoju paletu proizvoda i stavlja poseban fokus na segment usluga. takvim pristupom je schrack technik postala jedna od najvažnijih elektrotehničkih kompanija za klijente centralne i istočne europe. naš proizvodni program je raznovrstan i uvijek povezan sa najmodernijim tehnologijama. distribuiramo proizvode iz oblasti tehnike sustava, elektromobilnosti, energetske tehnike, informatičke tehnike i rasvjete te uvijek dajemo prednost kvalitativnim, visokovrijednim i dugotrajnim proizvodima koji idu u korak s vremenom. naši djelatnici uvjeravaju svojom stručnošću i znanjem kao i stalnim osobnim i opsežnim savjetima. bez obzira koristite li naš online shop za osobni konzalting ili vam pak na raspolaganju stoji naš zastupnik iz vanjske službe, naši su djelatnici spremni rado odvojiti svoje vrijeme i ponuditi vam savjet
business_tags: online shopping | mechanical engineering | electrical and electronic manufacturing | electrical, electronic, home appliances manufacturing
generated_description: schrack technik is a leading electrical engineering distribution company that specializes in distributing innovative products in the field of electrical engineering. founded in 1920 by dr. eduard schrack, the company has grown to become one of the most prominent electrical companies in central and eastern europe. with a focus on the service segment, schrack technika offers a diverse product portfolio that includes systems engineering, electromechanics, energy technology, information technology, and lighting. the company is known for providing high-quality, high-reliability, and long-lasting products that are in line with the latest technologies. schracktechnik's employees are highly skilled and knowledgeable, offering personal and comprehensive advice to customers through their online shop, personal concierge service, and overseas service representatives.
